name: Terrordactyl Carnivore
summary:
Terrordactyl Carnivore is a thrilling dinosaur action adventure game! Fly your pterodactyl through a treacherous ravine to rescue lost cars from a prehistoric time-warp.

Defeat all pterodactyls by landing on top of them to advance to the next level. Munch all orbs before they turn into pterodactyls. Use the arrow keys to control your pterodactyl: up - gain altitude, left and right - forward and back. Use the space bar to breathe fire. Collect power ups to enhance your pterodactyl's flight (extra life, force field, super speed, destroy all, anti-gravity).
